translation.readydesc: You are ready to go Abdelhamid Larachi, Let us show you how to get started!
translation.bookridedesc: Going somewhere? corpooling is the way to go ! book low cost sharing rides & travel with people going your way!
translation.offerridedesc: Driving somewhere ? Publish your ride ! Choose who goes with you and enjoy the least expensive ride you've ever made
translation.traveldesc: A global people-powered network with a trusted community of drivers and passengers operating across Algeria
translation.joindinna: Join Dinna carpooling community and save your time, money and our planet.
translation.confirmationcode: You'll receive a confirmation code via SMS.
translation.wesentcode: We sent a 4 digits code to
translation.passwordrequirements: The password must be at least 8 charachters, includes a number, and uppercase letter, and a lowercase letter.
translation.clearimagenotice: The image should be clear and have your face fully inside the frame.
translation.imageconfidentiality: Your picture will not be shared with any third parties and will be securely stored in accordance with industry standards.
translation.insuranceregulation: To comply with our insurance regulations and protect you, you need to provide us with one of the below.
translation.providenic: You'll be providing a card of your NIC
translation.providepassport: You'll be providing your passport information page
translation.providedriverlicense: You'll be providing a valid driver license
translation.legibledetails: Make sure details are legible, with no blurring or reflections!
translation.positiondocument: Position your document in the frame.
translation.scanpassport: Scan the passport page with biographic details containing your photograph of face and personal information.
translation.camerapermission: Dinna requires access to your device camera for identity verification. Please grant permission in your phone settings.
translation.comfortimportant: Comfort is important, leave a free seat in the back?
translation.sittight: No, they sit tight to three.
translation.indicatepreferences: Indicate the necessary information according to your preferences.
translation.atleastonepassenger: With at least one passenger over 80 km.
translation.getpaid: You get paid for a trip you were already planning to take.
translation.wantearnmoney: Want to earn money while traveling?
translation.offerrides: Offer rides to others going your way and earn cash on the go. Create a ride and start earning!
translation.numpassengers: How many passengers can you accept?
translation.platenumbertitle: What is your vehicle's plate number?
translation.platenumberjustified: We kindly ask that you enter the vehicle plate number of your car. This information will help ensure a safe and secure experience for all of our users. Thank you
translation.setprice: This is our recommended price per seat, you can set your own.
translation.idealprice: Ideal price for this ride, get passengers very quickly.
translation.pickuptime: What time do you pick up your passengers?
translation.locationaccess: Dinna requires access to your device location to provide you with the best experience. Please grant permission in the phone settings.
translation.numberofseatstoreserve: Number of seats you wish to reserve
translation.seatpositionnote: Selection does not guarentee seat position.
translation.defaultlanguagedesc: Select your default language settings, you can change the display language to your preferred language at any time.
translation.moresettings: Go back to find more settings you may want to change.
translation.supportdesc: Have questions or need to report a ride or service? We've got you covered. How can we help you?.
translation.callus: Call us in order to assist you.
translation.defaultpreferencesdesc: Select your default preference settings, you can change it at any time.
translation.discussiondesc: Select your default discussion preference, so people know how to act with you.
translation.cigarettedesc: Select your default cigarette preference, so people know how to act with you.
translation.musicdesc: Select your default music preference, so people know how to act with you.
translation.petsdesc: Select your default pets preference, so people know how to act with you.
translation.entercurrentpassword: Please enter your current account password.
translation.choosenewpassword: Choose a new password for your account
translation.passwordsuccessdesc: Your Account password has been changed successfully.
translation.phonesuccessdesc: Your Account phone number has been changed successfully.
translation.firstnamedesc: Under personal information, enter your first name so you can be identified.
translation.lastnamedesc: Under personal information, enter your last name so you can be identified.
translation.selectgenderdesc: Please select your gender, this will be used for client preference.
